creator: bzr1zs@eds.com
text:
Hi,

I am having troble in starting the server after my build. It says memory core dump error failing to start the server. 

Can anyone help?

./apachectl -k start
/usr/lib/hpux32/dld.so: '/usr/local/lib/hpux32/libexpat.so' is not a valid load module: Bad magic number
./apachectl[100]: 8195 Killed
Memory core dump error.

Thanks,
Raj
Once you've debugged your build environment, reopen if there's a specific problem with httpd.  An HP support forum might be a good place to start.
creator: covener@gmail.com
